content: HPS-1 Impact anchor (imperial) Economical impact plastic anchor with carbon steel screw (imperial standard sizes) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Quick installation using a hammer The hammer-driven screw can also be driven or unscrewed using a screwdriver Applications Fastening components for electrical and plumbing installations Light-duty fastening in a variety of base materials Anchoring concrete, brick and masonry ties Fastening trim strips, battens and components for electrical and plumbing installations ### TECHNICAL DATA: Head configuration: Flat head Environmental conditions: Dry indoor Approvals / Test reports: N/A Technical Data | Head configuration | Flat head | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor | Approvals / Test reports | N/A | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated, Plastic | Type of fixing | Through-fastening ### ITEMS- 260368 - Impact anchor HPS-1 1/4 x 1 - Package Size 200 pc Package Contents: - 1x HPS-1 1/4X1 Impact anchor assy - 247055 - Impact anchor HPS-1 1/4 x 1 MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 2400x HPS-1 1/4X1 Impact anchor assy - 260344 - Impact anchor HPS-1 1/4 x 1-5/8 - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x HPS-1 1/4X1 5/8 Impact anchor assy - 247056 - Impact anchor HPS-1 1/4 x 1-5/8 MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 900x HPS-1 1/4X1 5/8 Impact anchor assy - 260345 - Impact anchor HPS-1 1/4 x 2-1/16 - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x HPS-1 1/4X2 1/16 Impact anchor assy - 247057 - Impact anchor HPS-1 1/4 x 2-1/6 MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 900x HPS-1 1/4X2 1/16 Impact anchor assy - 260346 - Impact anchor HPS-1 1/4 x 2-5/8 - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x HPS-1 1/4X2 5/8 Impact anchor assy - 247058 - Impact anchor HPS-1 1/4 x 2-5/8 MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 900x HPS-1 1/4X2 5/8 Impact anchor assy
